quote: I had the pleasure of working with Tyler at UKG. He demonstrated a continuous eagerness to learn and grow. Tyler quickly demonstrated the ability to grasp new concepts and apply them effectively. He was always ready to contribute, ask insightful questions, and seek feedback to improve his skills. name: Nicole Meadows
title: Program Management | Service Request Delivery
quote: I had the pleasure of leading Tyler early in his career as an integration consultant at UKG. Tyler consistently demonstrated an exceptional ability to build relationships, effortlessly connecting with customers of all sizes and regions. His natural talent for fostering these connections enabled him to effectively gather requirements and understand the necessary logic for integration projects. Tyler is eager to learn and continuously seeks to improve. His coachable and adaptable nature allows him to quickly implement feedback and make noticeable improvements. I highly recommend Tyler for any role in tech consulting or sales, integrations, data analytics, or general technology. His dedication, skillset, and positive attitude will be a valuable asset to any team.
